subject: p13473495
History: Shortness of breath, altered mental status.
Findings: Severe cardiomegaly is unchanged. The mediastinal and hilar contours are similar. There is mild pulmonary vascular engorgement, also unchanged. Bibasilar airspace opacities could reflect atelectasis though infection or aspiration cannot be excluded. No large pleural effusion or pneumothorax is seen.
Impression: Mild pulmonary vascular engorgement and bibasilar opacities possibly reflecting atelectasis but infection or aspiration cannot be excluded.
